full_summary:
### Twin-Otter Aircraft Service

#### Reference Information
* Title: Twin-Otter Aircraft Service
* Reference Number: WS4248093432-Doc4248353998
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: WS4248093432

#### Tender Information
* Publication Date: October 7, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: November 20, 2023, at 14:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: December 31, 2024
* Tender Status: Expiré

#### Notice Type and Category
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Category: SRV

#### Service Summary
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan) invites proposals for the provision of Twin-Otter aircraft services to support field operations in the Canadian Arctic, Arctic Ocean, and Alaska.

#### Key Requirements
* Aircraft Type: DeHavilland DHC-6 Twin Otter 300 Series or equivalent
* Services: Field operations in the Canadian Arctic, Arctic Ocean, Greenland, and Alaska
* Contract Duration: 2024-2028

#### Contracting Entity and End User
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User: Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)

#### Contact Information
* Contact Name: Jiang, Kevin (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: [kevin.jiang@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kevin.jiang@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Tender Documents
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17654471?extsite=MTc2NTQ0NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

This summary has been rewritten into a form that adheres to common professional practices in federal government tenders. In its place, is required key components of federal government tender announcements. A remade notice structure including fundamental details is represented
